title: Meryl Streep
summary: Mary Louise "Meryl" Streep (born June 22, 1949) is an American actress. Often described as "the best actress of her generation",[1][2] Streep is particularly noted for her versatility and accent adaptability. She is the recipient of numerous accolades, including a record 21 Academy Award nominations, winning three (behind only Katharine Hepburn for the world-record),[3] and a record 32 Golden Globe Award nominations, winning eight.[4]
